Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
UserService is an interface that defines the methods for managing user-related operations. These operations include user creation, registration, updating user information, retrieving users, and checking if a user exists.

The methods in this interface throw BadRequestException and NotFoundException when the input is invalid or when the requested user data is not found.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      UserDTO createUser(RegisterUserDTO registerUserDTO) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Creates a new user based on the provided registration details.
      Parameters:
      registerUserDTO - the RegisterUserDTO containing the user registration data.
      Returns:
      the created UserDTO with user details.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the registration data is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if any associated data (e.g., roles) is not found.

    • registerUser

      JWTUserDTO registerUser(RegisterUserDTO registerUserDTO) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Registers a new user and returns a JWT for authentication.
      Parameters:
      registerUserDTO - the RegisterUserDTO containing the user registration data.
      Returns:
      the JWTUserDTO containing user details and the generated JWT.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the registration data is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if any associated data (e.g., roles) is not found.

    • updateUser

      UserDTO updateUser(Long id, UpdateUserDTO userDTO) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Updates an existing user's details.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to be updated.
      userDTO - the UpdateUserDTO containing updated user data.
      Returns:
      the updated UserDTO.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the updated data is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if the user with the given ID is not found.

    • getUserById

      UserDTO getUserById(Long id) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the UserDTO representing the user with the given ID.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the ID is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if no user is found with the given ID.

    • getUserByEmail

      UserEntity getUserByEmail(String email) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves a user by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the UserEntity representing the user with the given email.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the email is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if no user is found with the given email.

    • getAllUsers

      List<UserDTO> getAllUsers() throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of all users.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDTO representing all users.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if an error occurs while retrieving users.
      NotFoundException - if no users are found.

    • doesUserExist

      boolean doesUserExist(String username)
      Checks whether a user with the given username exists.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise.
